homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  MyCampusApp.rootScope.animatepage = function(currentstyle) {
    $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
  }
  var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
    var animatecss = $("#animatecss");
    if (!animatecss || animatecss.length <= 0) {
      $.ajax({
        url: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daneden/animate.css/master/animate.css",
        dataType: "text",
        success: function(data) {
          $("head").append("<style id='animatecss'>" + data + "</style>");
          clearInterval(hideInterval);
        }
      });
    }
  }, 2000);
  if (!MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded) {
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeStart", function(event, next, current) {
      $(".app-body").attr("class", "app-body animated ");
    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeSuccess", function(event, next, current) {
      currentstyle = "bounceInRight";
      if (next.loadedTemplateUrl == "partials/home.html" && current.loadedTemplateUrl != "partials/home.html") {
        currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
      } else if (current.loadedTemplateUrl != "partials/home.html") {
        if (next.params.appid == current.params.appid && next.params.appid == next.params.pageid) {
          currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
        }
        if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage) {
          if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage.appid == next.params.appid && MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage.pageid == next.params.pageid) {
            currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
          }
        }
      }
      $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
      $(".app-body").addClass("animated");
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.cpage = next.params;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage = current.params;
    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded = true;
  }
</script>
